channel.title: Chaning Monster Stats
channel.description:
Hi,
I have a PI-based server and I'd like to change some NPC's stats and than not only the Health and Combat level but mainly their attack and defense level! I forgot what file it was in and I can't seem to find it, does anyone know where to search?
Thank you!

item.title: Chaning Monster Stats
item.dc:creator: @grvzdavdubz grvzdavdubz
item.description:
@grvzdavdubz wrote:

In the file spawn-config.java, The entry’s in there should be set out like this: (Fire Giant as example)

spawn = 1586 3297 9170 0 5 1 25 250 300 FireGiant1

What it means=

spawn = (id) (cord1) (cord 2) (height) (walk) (maxhit) (attack) (defense) (description)

Hope this helped

Read full topic
